targets.expr: sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{family="IPv6", type="EchoRequest"}[1m])) by (pod) - sum(rate(hubble_icmp_total{family="IPv6", type="EchoReply"}[1m])) by (pod)

panels.title: Top 10 Source Pods with Denied Packets
Top 10 Destination Pods with Denied Packets

targets.expr: round(sum(rate(hubble_http_requests_total{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, source_namespace, source_workload, status), 0.001)

panels.title: Incoming Requests by Source and Response Code

targets.expr:
sum(rate(hubble_http_requests_total{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}",status!~"5.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, source_namespace, source_workload)
/
sum(rate(hubble_http_requests_total{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, source_namespace, source_workload)

panels.title: Incoming Request Success Rate (non-5xx responses) By Source

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, source_namespace, source_workload, le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, source_namespace, source_workload, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(hubble_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, source_namespace, source_workload, le))

round(sum(rate(hubble_http_requests_total{cluster=~"${cluster}", destination_namespace=~"${destination_namespace}", destination_workload=~"${destination_workload}", reporter="${reporter}", source_namespace=~"${source_namespace}", source_workload=~"${source_workload}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, destination_namespace, destination_workload, status), 0.001)
